description.zh-cn: 陕西省人民政府的组成部门、主管陕西省教育工作的省级教育行政部门。
description.en: A component department of the Shaanxi Provincial People's Government and the provincial-level education administrative department in charge of education in Shaanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任陕西省教育厅厅长兼中共陕西省委教育工作委员会书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Department of Education and the Secretary of the Education Work Committee of the CPC Shaanxi Provincial Committee.

nodes.id: 中共陕西省委教育工作委员会

zh-cn: 中共陕西省委教育工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在陕西省教育系统设立的领导机构。
description.en: The leading body established by the Communist Party of China in the education system of Shaanxi Province.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国教育部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部
en: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管教育事业和语言文字工作的组成部门。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees education and language-related work.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国陕西省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Shaanxi Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党陕西省委员会
en: Shaanxi Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在陕西省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Shaanxi Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党陕西省教育局委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党陕西省教育局委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在陕西省教育厅内设立的基层委员会。
description.en: The primary-level committee of the Communist Party of China established within the Shaanxi Provincial Department of Education.

description.zh-cn: 王树声担任陕西省教育厅厅长。
description.en: Wang Shusheng serves as the Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Department of Education.

relationships.target: 中共陕西省委教育工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 王树声兼任中共陕西省委教育工作委员会书记。
description.en: Wang Shusheng concurrently serves as the Secretary of the Education Work Committee of the CPC Shaanxi Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 陕西省教育厅在业务上接受中华人民共和国教育部的指导。
description.en: The Shaanxi Provincial Department of Education is professionally supervised by the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 陕西省教育厅是陕西省人民政府的组成部门。
description.en: The Shaanxi Provincial Department of Education is a component department of the Shaanxi Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 陕西省教育厅主管陕西省的教育工作。
description.en: The Shaanxi Provincial Department of Education is in charge of educational affairs in Shaanxi Province.

relationships.source: 中国共产党陕西省教育局委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党陕西省教育局委员会是中国共产党陕西省委员会的下级组织。
description.en: The Committee of the Communist Party of China in the Shaanxi Provincial Education Bureau is a subordinate organization of the Shaanxi Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.
